K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-047:138b-0: @138b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-047:138b-1: na ma: sa manta bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-047:138b-2: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-047:138b-3: aom dhu na dhu na h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-047:138b-4: 'di bzung bas 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-047:138b-5: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
